articles.title: Former Willow head pastry chef brings back forgotten flavours at her own dessert parlour, Catkin - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Soh Hui Shan is reviving the concept of dessert omakase at her parlour, Catkin, which she opened after leaving her job as head pastry chef at Hong Kong Street restaurant Willow.

articles.description: On the fifth episode of CNA Women's Womankind podcast, hosts Hidayah Salamat and Penelope Chan talk to former corporate lawyer and co-founder of online counselling service Talk Your Heart Out, Shilpa Jain.
